website_summaries.verdict: Whimsical option for a Christmas tree topper that works nicely for a specialized tree.
pros: Has a smiling snowman head and poseable arms that small children will love
Constructed with durable metal and polyester
Can pair this topper with other ornaments to create a tree that resembles a snowman for a fun tree design
cons: Creates a non-traditional look in a holiday tree that some people will not like

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this turned out! I have a slimmer 7.5ft tree. I stuffed the hat part of the snowman with a couple newspapers and used a couple empty wrapping paper rolls to get the whole thing to stand up straight. Love that the arms have wire so you can bend and shape how you want! Overall a great purchase and totally worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Barry

customer_reviews.title: Great tree topper!
customer_reviews.text: The product is well made. I did have to stuff the snowman with newspaper to make him fluff up, but other than that it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quite happy with this guy
customer_reviews.text: Quite happy with this guy! His face and hat are felt, and yes, it's kind of flat. We just used some of the packaging that came with him to fill out his hat before putting him on the tree. Will definitely be using him again next year!
customer_reviews.author: Brigitte W. Flett

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Our snowman tree turned out so cute! This topper was the perfect addition!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Adorable tree topper however it does not look as good as item discription. The snowman face is made of a felt like material. It takes some moving around to make it fit over tree and make face appear circular. It also looks a little funny when lights are turned on. The material is thick enough u can't see right through it but it's too thin for lights. I have colored lights on my tree so the snowman face has all kids of dots on his face when tree is on. Overall it is still a very cute topper and I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: K. Schott

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, but beautiful
customer_reviews.text: It’s super cute!!!!😍 only down side is it comes apart too quick the parts come glued on and the glue already fell off one parts which sucks bc I just received it today not to mention on one side it came a bit torn a little disappointed but won’t return only bc I’m a big Christmas lover and my tree has already been up and waiting for the this piece so it would suck to go through the whole return process and have to wait again 😫😒 other than that it’s exactly how I pictured it to be
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is super cute- but it’s a little hard to get on the tree and then you have to find something to stuff it with in order for it to stay up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big Giant Tree Topper!!
customer_reviews.text: So I was quite surprised when I opened this product. The quality is quite nice and it is HUGE! In my pic I placed a paper towel roll next to it for scope. The arms are quite long and have a bendable wire to secure it. The scarf is also very long and plenty of material to weave into a tree. It's going to look amazing on my tree!! Can't wait. Not sure you will find a item this nice for this amount. Also note, it came with a little note from the small business owner who designed and made the item. Single mom and provides her contact info if you have any problems with the product. Nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea F

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive but nice
customer_reviews.text: I’m looking forward to making my Christmas tree a little different this year with this snowman topper. We’d thought of buying a snowman tree but hated to spend the money. This will us to turn our existing tree into a snowman. The topper is very cute and certainly sturdy enough for its job. There room in the head to stuff it with fiber fill to make it rounder. We will definitely do that.
customer_reviews.author: SLR

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Love this , it is super cute , doesn’t seem cheaply made , Just note that you will need a stick or something to hold the hat up which wasn’t a issue .
customer_reviews.author: Shaquana Perry

customer_reviews.title: decent product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have 40 sheets of tissue paper in mine already. People... be sure if you use paper or tissue, you probably should not put this snowman over lights on the tree. May be a fire hazard. That said, we unplugged the top part of our lights and used it. It looks nice, however one of the eyes was half off and bent (felt circle), so I had leftover 1 inch google eyes that I glued on instead. The arms are sturdy and the scarf is nice. I am reasonably pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Nanci  D

customer_reviews.title: It's bigger than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone loves our snowman topper! I underestimated the size, so I had to get a little creative and really get the tree top up in there! Used grocery bags to stuff the rest of the head until it was nice and filled out. I had to fold the hat down a tad but it's not noticeable. I love the colors if the scarf! Thre only issue I found was the wire through the arms could be a little longer as it didn't reach all the way on one side but we managed with careful placement if the gloves in the tree limbs.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Powell

customer_reviews.title: Love my snowman tree topper!!
customer_reviews.text: I have gotten so many compliments on this! The only thing I did have to do was stuff the hat some to make it look fuller and not fall over!!
customer_reviews.author: shelley mccloskey

customer_reviews.title: It is flat, and opens easily to stuff
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two boxes of dishes for my daughter's Christmas present. I wanted to not make her gift obvious, until Christmas when all of the family is sitting around the tree. Mr. Snowman needed a head. I had batting and felt for his two sectioned body. The Head I ordered fit the bill. Wires in arms are bendable.
customer_reviews.author: Aninal lover and Reader

customer_reviews.title: This was AMAZING TOPPER
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 6 ft. tree because I wanted it to look a little bigger in my living space. The size of this was great. The colors were great. We really loved it and the grand kiddos enjoyed it as well. I used a small travel pillow I purchased and left the plastic on it so it would smoothly go into the head. A very good product priced fairly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Cute
customer_reviews.text: I put this on my little four foot tree so it would fit in my bay window. Really cute. Granddaughter loves it. It would be nice if the face was on both sides. I pointed the face to the inside of house so we would see the snowman, but that means anyone walking or driving by will see the blank back of his head. Can't really answer to durability since I just got it. Will see how it holds up after a year of storage.
customer_reviews.author: Cj

customer_reviews.title: Turns your tree into Frosty The Snowman... so cute!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute tree topper... my granddaughter loves snowmen so this was for her. Have a cheap bag of fiberfill handy to stuff in Frosty’ hat and face so he can ‘come to life’. He’s huge and makes quite an impression.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanine Smythe

customer_reviews.title: Snowman Topper
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson who is 1yrs old and kinda knows what Christmas is. So we bought him his own tree. With that, we wanted to do a different tree topper. And I seen this on Amazon and had to get!!! I read the directions, which were very easy and it turned out perfect!!! I think he's gonna love it!! Thank you a cute and wonderful Christmas tree topper!!! And one with kids will fall in love with is!!!
customer_reviews.author: LIkeaBoss

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE! We have gotten so many compliments on this tree topper! And our 2 year old son couldn’t love it more either! Easy to put up. I stuffed the head and hat with reusable plastic grocery bags and it worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Bibee

customer_reviews.title: Adorable Addition
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for..something different that was cute and whimsical for our basement tree. Stuffing the head and not over stuffing was key for the perfect fit. I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Boojc

customer_reviews.title: Cutest tree topper
customer_reviews.text: The little note that came with this is precious. I love stories of moms making it and raising a family. You’re #1 mama and you made an amazing tree topper with this snowman. All I can say is ... you better order now because I’m sure this is going to sell out before Christmas. Cute, Cute,Cute! ❤️❤️
customer_reviews.author: Ljh

customer_reviews.title: I love my snowman tree topper
customer_reviews.text: I love my snowman tree topper! I had to use a 1/3 of a wrapping paper roll to put in the hat to keep it from flopping over, but it looks great! The skinny arms don't bother me and I love the idea of folding this up and not worrying it. I had a bow that I always had to meticulously pack away.
customer_reviews.author: bass3

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I brought this topper because I'm lazy and when it comes to decorating a Christmas tree I feel like it's the worst thing ever. But this topper actually made decorating my tree so much fun. It's great quality and easy to do....especially for people like me who hate decorating a Christmas tree!
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but difficult to work with.
customer_reviews.text: The picture looks so cute, we had to try it! If only I could have gotten it to look like the picture :(. I stuffed the top, but couldn’t get it to stay upright atop our tree. We return this unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Elliott1282

customer_reviews.title: Nice Christmas tree topper
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this Christmas tree topper, looks amazing in our tree... It’s big and you can tell that is made with good materials... You have to fill it, but that’s not big of a deal, I had plush stuffing, so consider that...
customer_reviews.author: Anabelle De La Garza

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size! I bought it to replace my small ...
customer_reviews.text: LIVE IT! Perfect size! I bought it to replace my small lighted star, but instead I wound up just slipping the snowman over my star so frosty's face was lit up. And since he has wire arms, I was able to make it look like he was holding my Christmas lights!
customer_reviews.author: Marielle

customer_reviews.title: product is as stated
customer_reviews.text: I love it......but I need to make a suggestion....do not use paper to fill him up makes it to top heavy and it falls over as the metal in the arms is not designed to hold that weight...I suggest using pillow fiber to fill it up a lot less weight...
customer_reviews.author: bantha

customer_reviews.title: Makes me smile
customer_reviews.text: I stuffed the hat and face with tissue paper and placed it on top of the tree. It looks great - it makes me smile whenever I see it. I'm a senior citizen and my daughter is grown, but just had to get it. I would recommend this topper for any age.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS!
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest damn thing I have ever seen! This year we are doing snowmen and we will be getting the reindeer and the santa from this seller as well! I love this! We stuffed ours with kroger plastic bags! LOVE LOVE LOVE!
customer_reviews.author: Erica Vaught

customer_reviews.title: SO ADORABLE
customer_reviews.text: What a cute and clever idea... this year we were making snowman tree and this is adorable!!!!! Actually larger than I thought and made of good quality - everyone loves it wrapped around our tree :) Merry Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Very Creative and Colorful
customer_reviews.text: This was really different for me,but I like that you can stuff it with wrapping paper which is what I did. This is our first tree topper and my family likes it a lot. This tree topper really gives your tree personality and it’s colorful.
customer_reviews.author: Rose91

customer_reviews.title: Perfect purchase!
customer_reviews.text: It is better than the pictures. I love this more than I thought I would. Perfect color, size and great buy! I would buy it again. You won't regret your purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Daphne Hill

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The description didn’t indicate that you actually have to “stuff” this in order for it to be a true topper otherwise it is more like something that you would hang on the wall. VERY disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Renee West

customer_reviews.title: Great for Toddlers and Cats!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed! I have a 3 year old and 5 cats. This is a great way to put up a tree without have the ornaments taken off of it. The cats haven’t jumped in the tree yet. It’s only been up 2 days but so far they’re uninterested in it.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: This is super cute, had to stuff it and it looks nice on my tree
customer_reviews.author: Elianna Ceja

customer_reviews.title: Tree Topper
customer_reviews.text: I love the tree topper. At first glance I thought it was too big. But it fits perfectly on my tree. Other tree toppers just fit on a tiny limb. I love how this covers the top so that it doesn't lean over.
customer_reviews.author: Zina Young

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This was so amazing! I got so many compliments from everyone and it looked beautiful on my tree. Very sturdy and never fell. I packed this away and will definitely use again for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Monique Bastien

customer_reviews.title: Cool tree topper
customer_reviews.text: Had to add some pipes to get it to stand up but the kids absolutely love this.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Su Aponte

customer_reviews.title: Just as it describes
customer_reviews.text: Love it a little hard to put on my try maybe because it’s fake tree ??? I don’t know but I made it work and I love it i stuffed the hat with pillows stuffing before putting it up
customer_reviews.author: nereida

customer_reviews.title: You need some cotton are newspaper to stuffed his head.
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money very large size.Very beautiful put it on top of my Christmas tree.Only thing I had to do was stuff it with cotton.You will love it when you ordered it got so many compliments from all my friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Judy A.

customer_reviews.title: So Cute & BIG
customer_reviews.text: This added the touch to my 9 ft Christmas tree! Simply adorable & has many compliments on it
customer_reviews.author: PAP

customer_reviews.title: I am strong
customer_reviews.text: This guy has been through wind rain & snow & looks like day he was placed on tree Will get another ice him
customer_reviews.author: Loreene Thomas

customer_reviews.title: The Adorable Christmas Tree Topper
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cute tree topper for my whimsical tree. Last year I only had an elf hat at the top, but I had to get a bigger tree so this is a perfect size. I’m just trying to adjust the arms to look like the one in the picture. I didn’t see or feel an opening in the arm section for stuffing with paper.
customer_reviews.author: Dook2

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: I love this snowman. I did not use it for the top of the tree this year but maybe I will next year
customer_reviews.author: muneca

customer_reviews.title: Great product 👍
customer_reviews.text: I love Snow Man. It's so beautiful on top of the Christmas tree 😍
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Large and Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Love this tree topper. It is very big, and perfect for my 7 1/2 foot tree. Just stuff the head with newspaper, place on the tree and pose the arms and scarf. So cute!
customer_reviews.author: Nonny

customer_reviews.title: awful
customer_reviews.text: This piece of junk was the stupidest looking tree topper. First of all, it was huge! and it was all fabric, no support at all. I don't know how other people got it to stand up sttaight!? Was I supposed to stuff it with something? I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa D

customer_reviews.title: Cute!  Priced Right!
customer_reviews.text: Cute. I wouldn’t let kids play with it or pull on it because it will fall apart. Not super sturdy but that not a problem for me since it’s just going to sit on top of my tree.
customer_reviews.author: K. R.

customer_reviews.title: A unique & fun topper!
customer_reviews.text: Such a cool topper! Just add a couple grocery bags to the head to fill it in some & it’s ready to go! I get many compliments on him.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: cute, love it
customer_reviews.text: once you stuff it, its really nice an durable. would recommend. i love it
customer_reviews.author: babetta hayes

customer_reviews.title: perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.text: I love to create things, I stuffed the head with plastic bags and installed it on a small christmas tree which I sprayed with flocking . I put it outside on my lawn for the holidays and put the hand up to wave at passers by. I got many compliments on my decor.
customer_reviews.author: Doris Zimmermann

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy.
customer_reviews.text: Super cute to add to the top of a tree! Made out of felt. Looks great. Arms have wire. Love It!!! It will fold up nice to store.
customer_reviews.author: Lexie McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: It does not look like the picture
customer_reviews.text: It was very difficult to place on top of the tree, it does't look fluffy like the one you see in the product description
customer_reviews.author: LauraLam

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Not what I was expecting. I didn't want to use it as a tree topper, but wanted it looking out from behind the tree. Now that I know the whole top is flimsy, I have to find something to stuff it with. Disappointing to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: Lacosta Carrell

customer_reviews.title: Snowman Success!!!
customer_reviews.text: Got a lovely card from the maker of this snowman! Very nice! Probably prompted this review. I happened to have had a pillow which my new puppy recently chewed a hole into so I just took the stuffing & filled out our Snowman head & hat. Stuffed some branches inside & he looks just lovely! Like he is presenting the Christmas Tree!!! Quality is great too!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Bland

customer_reviews.title: Looks just like the picture
customer_reviews.text: I love this product it looks so cute on my tree, it's kind of hard to get on but I don't mind it just means it'll stay up there without falling down or anything 😊🎅
customer_reviews.author: rachel

customer_reviews.title: Fun Festive Tree Topper
customer_reviews.text: Great tree topper!!! Snowman with top hat tree topper is whimsically festive atop tree while each arm drape around. Folds flat for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Bigger than expected. Made my tree look very festive. Had to use a lot of newspaper to stuff but totally worth it
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Truman

customer_reviews.title: Snow man tree topper
customer_reviews.text: Love this is so cute!! I stuffed mine with news paper and a Than used a empty paper towel cardboard roll for the center to put in the top of tree it worked really good to make it very sturdy!!
customer_reviews.author: Liliac

customer_reviews.title: Pefect!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it. I didn't want a traditional tree this year so I decide I wanted a snowman tree but they weren't any I really like. I seen this topper and feel in love with it.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia

customer_reviews.title: Extreemly cute
customer_reviews.text: We all loved the snowman! Every year my family decorates a Christmas tree for our local Hospice's silent auction. Our tree received a lot of interest during the decorating event at the mall and went for a lot of $$$$.
customer_reviews.author: Linda G

customer_reviews.title: Small opening for thin tree tops only
customer_reviews.text: This will only work with trees that have a tall skinny tree top. The opening isn’t very wide. It would be better if there was Velcro at the sides of the opening for fuller tree tops.
customer_reviews.author: Tessasmom1

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: So cute that is a little small for my tiny tree
customer_reviews.author: Leslie MacLaren

customer_reviews.title: Well worth buying....Love it...
customer_reviews.text: Fits well on my tree...The snowman is exactly as you describe it...The grandkids gonna love it...What is there not to like,I absolutely love it..I use Buffalo Snow for filling for the head...I would recommend anyone to buy it...
customer_reviews.author: CMB

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to the tree
customer_reviews.text: This was a present for my mom, she liked it a lot. Looks amazing, size is good and the materials are also good.
customer_reviews.author: Yessica

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Very well made
customer_reviews.text: Super Super Cute!!! Made Very Well!!! I just Love it ! Ty!!!

customer_reviews.title: Love the Snowman Tree Topper
customer_reviews.text: I love this so much. Especially since it does not have any styrofoam to disintegrate.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly A Smith

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tree topper
customer_reviews.text: Unique and so cute!! I did take some batting and stuff his hat and head because that was easier than stuffing branches in there! But great size, and is an eye catcher! He is on our 10’ tree.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Hafer

customer_reviews.title: Great tree topper
customer_reviews.text: Love this.. stuffed it with grocery plastic bags and it looks great.. Great price and so nice!

customer_reviews.title: snownman
customer_reviews.text: I really think this snowman is real cute a lot bigger than I thought but I love it

customer_reviews.title: May fave small defects.
customer_reviews.text: I only gave it a 4 because one of the arm was stitched wrong and I had to improvise.

customer_reviews.title: Love him!
customer_reviews.text: Have to stuff the hat but very happy with my snowman topper! He is HUGE and absolutely perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Hanes

customer_reviews.title: Snowman tree topper
customer_reviews.text: The head is flimsy. I am going to remove the scarf and arms and attach them to another snowman tree topper that is solid.
customer_reviews.author: Sheree

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: Snowman look beautiful on my tree everyone gave good compliments. I bought cotton to stuff the snowman and look great.

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: pretty big for my pencil tree. Everyone loves it. Only need 1/2 bag of pulled cotton.

customer_reviews.text: I loved it I used it in my work office and it was a gift with a white tree

customer_reviews.title: Very cute tooper
customer_reviews.text: This is a super cute tree topper, it’s felt so it’s flimsy but I stuffed it with tissue paper and it looks great on our tree! My son loves it!

customer_reviews.title: SO CUTE!!
customer_reviews.text: We love this tree topper! It sits right on top, and the arms wrap around the tree without any problem.

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: you have to have a real skinny tree for it to work, waste of money.....

customer_reviews.title: Snowman Tree Topper
customer_reviews.text: This came out so cute for our tree! Loved it! A little over priced but it was worth it!

customer_reviews.title: Cute, Cute, Cute
customer_reviews.text: Love this tree topper. So unusual and absolutely stunning. I have it on a table lamp right now, but he stands very upright and stable. I filled his hat and head with bubble wrap. Just lovely.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Made my xmas tree beautiful. Tired of stars, angel or bow topper.

customer_reviews.title: Frosty Tree Topper
customer_reviews.text: Size was huge it would cover half the tree. It was more like a chair cover. The quality of the fabric was poor. Not happy with this purchase. Ive bought other snowman tree toppers in the past from amazon and they were sized appropriately for the tree.

customer_reviews.title: Super CUTE!
customer_reviews.text: Soooo stink’n CUTE & so easy to use. You’ll need to stuff it with paper or small bubble wrap & you’ll be good to go!

customer_reviews.text: Very nice look. Had to add stuffing to stiffen it up. Family enjoys it.

customer_reviews.text: Too big for the top of my 10 ft Christmas tree but I had I better idea! Stuffed with bubble wrap! The quality is okay but does the job!

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grapevine tree outside and it looked great.

product_meta.title: luck sea Christmas Tree Topper Snowman Hugger - Xmas/Holiday/Winter Wonderland Party Decoration Ornament Supplies
feature_bullets: Measurement - Snowman face: 14.5" H. Arms : 21.6" L. Scarf : 23.6" L.
Where to use? - You can put this on the top of christmas tree to decorate your house.Cheerful snowman sits atop your tree and wraps his long arms around it in a festive hug.

Note - This is an iron wire in his arm, you can pose him as you want.Please know the snowman's head and hat are hollow, but stand up real stiff when you put it over branch. If branch is not long enough to keep snowman's head up,you may need to stuff it.
You can coordinate with other christmas party supplies and winter party decorations to create a completely festive atmosphere.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars908 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
